如何在shell脚本里实现递归呢？请看下面的例子

使用递归求阶乘

factorial() { 

      if [ $1 -eq 1 ] 
      then
              echo 1
      else
              local tmp=$[ $1 - 1 ]
              local ret=`factorial $tmp`
              echo $[ $ret * $1 ]
      fi

}

read -p “enter value:” value

ret=`factorial $value`

echo “the factorial of $value is $ret”
